title: HIS TURN: WHEN ENOUGH WAS ENOUGH
description: "HIS When Enough was Enough" is an anthology based on the lives and experiences of five men of God who soon find out what they thought they had control over, actually had control over them. They share how they came face-to-face with death, abuse, addictions, and infidelity. They soon discovered the sting of the inevitable fall that comes when we seek to do things our way.
author: Karen D. Lomax
